category.name: Workflow
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CR_allow_alternate_procedures
preference.preference_description:
Manages the visibility of workflow templates in the "New Process" panel of the Workflow application in the rich client. Valid Values: * any : The "All" option is pre-selected in the "All/Assigned" radio button group, which means that all templates are listed. * Assigned: The "Assigned" option is pre-selected in the "All/Assigned" radio button group, which means that only the templates assigned to the group and selected target object type are listed. This is the default value. * none: The options "All/Assigned" are not visible. Furthermore, only the templates assigned to the group and selected target object type are displayed (behaviour similar to the "Assigned" option). When no templates are assigned for the target group/type, the displayed list is empty. If no object was selected when initiating the workflow, all the templates assigned to the group are listed.
Process templates assigned to a group and a target object type are defined through the "Process designer->Edit->Template Filter" command.
